name: European Union National Institutes of Culture
membership:
Membership of Anna Lindh Foundation
http://www.annalindhfoundation.org
goal: EUNIC's mission is to act as an advocate of the value of cultural relations in promoting better international understanding.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Mainstreaming culture in EU agendas, transnational cooperation in the field of culture and related areas - human and civil rights, development cooperation, sustainability conflict prevention and resolution, cultural trade, equal opportunities, rule of law, freedom of speech, liveable cities and inclusion.
Formation/consultations of EU external cultural relations policy strategy. EUNIC sees itself as the advocate of an arms-length approach to cultural relations and partnership dialogue for Europe in the world.
